Title: Swan Song
Plot: As summer approaches, everyone gets ready for various travels. Dawson prepares to head out for LA with Audrey, while Jack and Jen get ready for their Costa Rica vacation. Left behind in Capeside for the summer, Joey and Pacey lament their fates - until they make a crucial last-minute decision that changes everything.
GuestStars: Afemo Omilami, Brian LaFontaine, Logan R. Berkshire, Lynn O'Connell, Jennifer Ferrin, Ashley Williams
